sentence.Network_en: My great-grandfather was a person of some importance here.
sentence.Network_cn: 我曾祖父曾是这儿的头面人物。

sentence.Network_en: They have a stronger appreciation of the importance of economic incentives.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对经济激励的重要性有了更深的理解。

sentence.Network_en: The support of our members is of great importance to the Association.
sentence.Network_cn: 会员的支持对于我们协会来说非常重要。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... taught 教 importance 重要性 care 照料.
高中英语单词表 ... important a. 重要的，重大的；有地位的，有权力的 importance n. 重要性，重大，价值 imperialist n. 帝国主义者.
Have pointed out the importance that social insurance fund law oversees once again ;, 再次指出了社会保险基金法律监管的重要意义;

though there have been some changes for the better in recent years's fair to say that the quality of Chinese economic data has not risen as rapidly as China's importance in the global economy .中国经济数据在近几年出现了一些好的变化，但可以说，其质量的提升，还没有赶上中国在全球经济中重要性的上升速度。

jx.jx_en_mean: having a very high opinion of oneself; self-important
jx.jx_cn_mean: 狂妄自大的，自视甚高的

means.word_mean: 意义,后果,价值,重力,压力,紧迫性
高位,权力,威严,显要,骄傲自大

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French, from medieval Latin importantia, from important- 'being of consequence', from the verb importare (see import)

entry.def: The importance of something is its quality of being significant, valued, or necessary in a particular situation.

example.ex: We have always stressed the importance of economic reform...
example.tran: 我们一向强调经济改革的重要性。

entry.def: Importance means having influence, power, or status.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being important and worthy of note;

auth_sentence.content: The importance of this was made clear last night.
auth_sentence.res_content: The importance of this was made clear last night.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The importance of this was made clear last night.

auth_sentence.content: This is an area of importance for the BBC.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is an area of importance for the BBC.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is an area of importance for the BBC.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Brown stressed again the importance of cutting taxes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Brown stressed again the importance of cutting taxes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Brown stressed again the importance of cutting taxes.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

Sentence.sentence: The latest congressional report acknowledges the critical importance of technical training, but also asserts that the study of the humanities (人文学科)and social sciences must remain central components of America's educational system at all levels.
The humanities and STEM subjects should be given equal importance
To stress the importance of energy conservation.
They attach too much importance to public relations
Americans now attach more importance to the effective use of time.
Regarding gender role building, social learning theories attach greater importance to socialization in one's childhood than in their adulthood or later life.

jushi.chinese: 这一因素日益显出其重要性。

jushi.english: He was small and well dressed, and seemed to regard himself with some importance.
jushi.chinese: 他个子不高,衣冠楚楚,好像自以为有点了不起。

jushi.english: We persuaded him of its importance.
jushi.chinese: 我们要他相信此事的重要性。
